string.value: It's time for Thanksgiving and I'm ready for some home cookin'! I should pay Mom and Dad a visit over in Henesys!

I'm helping Mom and Dad make Thanksgiving dinner! I have to gather one of each ingredient: 1 ear of #b#t2020029##k, a can of #b#t2022262##k, a #b#t2022263##k, bowl of #b#t2022264##k and best of all, #b#t2022261##k. They promised me an #b#t4031529##k if I return quickly. I guess the Turkeys stole all the ingredients to make Thanksgiving fixins'... I guess they think that without the fixins', there'll be no dinner! No dinner? No way! Time to defeat some battle-hardened Turkeys!

My trusty weapon did a fine job of ruffling those rowdy turkeys' feathers, and I obtained all of the ingredients for Mom and Dad. In return, they gave me my #b#t4031529##k! I guess doing chores does pay off! I can take this to any of the Store Vendors in New Leaf City, and receive a #bNexon Game Card#k for it! ...I'd better get out of here before Aunt Petunia shows up! Mom mentioned that I can help her with dinner once a day until it's time to eat!

Well, dear, it's our turn to host the Thanksgiving feast this year, so we have a lot of preparation to do! Mind your parents for a moment, and I'll tell you all about it!

#b#L0#Your cooking is the best! Count me in!#l#k
#b#L1#I haven't listened to you guys for a long, long time. What makes you think I'm going to start now?#l#k

Why thank you, dear! I know how much you love Thanksgiving dinner...Remember last year? You ate so much you just passed out on the couch!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#The food was too good! Just thinking about this year's meal is making my stomach grumble!#l#k

So that was the noise I heard! Well, you'll have to give me some help this year. Since we're hosting, I'll have to make more food--I don't want to hear Aunt Petunia's whining about how she didn't get enough to eat this year.\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Uhh, I don't want to say anything, Mom, but can she fit in the door?#l#k

This year, yes, because we resized it. Twice, just to be sure. We still need to buy a bigger table... but that's something we'll let your Father take care of.\r\nAs for you, I have all my pots and pans ready to go, but I'm missing a few ingredients--I still have to make the Creamed #t2020029# Concoction, Crazy #t2022262#, Mushroom Stuffing Supreme, Triple-#t2022263#es and my own special, Groovy #t2022264#! Everything to make your favorite fixins'! It's going to be a fine feast this year! So are you ready to help me gather these ingredients?
Tsk, tsk. Such a shame that you don't listen to your parents anymore...<sob> You're breaking your poor mother's heart!

Wonderful! I just need one of each of the following: #b#t2020029##k for the Creamed Corn, a can of #b#t2022262##k, #b#t2022261##k--I've already got the mushrooms, a #b#t2022263##k, and a tin of #b#t2022264##k to top it off. In return, for being such a good child, I'll give you an #b#t4031529##k! You can use it to visit the vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k for those games you love so much!

I know it's a lot, dearie... I would tell you to go to the market but apparently all the stores have been cleaned out! I heard from Grandma Benson that it looks like those crazy Turkeys armed themselves this year. Apparently they robbed all the markets of all the items for Thanksgiving fixins'. Unbelievable! What are those Turkeys thinking and what is this world coming to? Well... I would try hunting these and you should be able to get back the things I need. Maybe you can even bring back an extra turkey... wouldn't that be something! Hurry back so I can start cooking soon!
Disappointing. It's your choice, I suppose... you're old enough to make your own decisions. But you're not completely off the hook, dear. Be sure to come back--you can do the dishes!
Wonderful timing, dear! I've got everything I need to make this the best Thanksgiving dinner yet! As promised, here's your #b#t4031529##k!

Remember, you can head to one of the towns-#rHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City,#k and speak to the Store Vendors there for a #bNexon Game Card#k! Tell you what, honey, you can bring me more ingredients tomorrow! I'll keep making more food every day until Thanksgiving is over just to be sure that all of us --and not just your Aunt-- get enough to eat this year. Okay? See you tomorrow, dear!
Oh dear, looks like you still haven't got all the ingredients I need! Just think of how grumpy Aunt Petunia will get! Be sure to get them all and come back!
